page.title: 18My Favourite Day - Tuesday
page.content: {7.30 a.m.}I stretch, get out of bed and dress ready for school. {8.00 a.m.}Two cups of coffee and a round of toast and then I pack my swimming kit. {8.30 a.m.}I clean my teeth and then off to school.{ {9.00 a.m.}First its maths. {10.30 a.m.}Music theory with Mrs. Koop. {11.00 a.m.}Leave for swimming at Ibstock High School. {12.20 p.m.}Back for a late lunch. {1.30 p.m.}In the afternoon it may be English, Science, Project work or Art. {3.30 p.m.}Home from school. {4.00 p.m.}Organ practice. {5.00 p.m.}Dinner with the family. {6.00 p.m.}Organ lesson. {7.00 p.m.}Television till time for bed {8.30 p.m.}Zzzzzzz...
